posts.post_content:
Offered here is a Fred Pfeffer Sovereign 460 T206 graded a PSA 4. It is quite nice with great color and registration. It has a nice clean back. Slightly off center right to left this is a solid 4 and a very nice card. My apologies for the crooked cell phone pictures but at least there is no glare. Great card 
$369.00 SOLD  net to me plus 5.00 for shipping with tracking
